== Biography ==
John Thomas Callender was born in Stockton-on-Tees, County Durham in about 1879.  When the 1881 Census was taken on 3 April 1881, he was a 2 year old child living at Hardwick Field Farm, Darlington Back Lane, Stockton-on-Tees.  His father is a Butcher and Farmer of 22 acres called [[Callender-692|George Callender]].  His mother was [[Best-7946|Alice Best]] who had died in 1869 and his father was now married to [[Anderson-83115|Anne Anderson]].<ref>

By the time of the next Census in 1891, John was at School and the family was living at 33 Windsor Road, Oxbridge, Stockton-on-Tees. His father was a Butcher and there is no Occupation listed against his mother.<ref>
